This amazing luxury building is located in the heart of the West Loop.
Take advantage of this convertible unit now.
Pets are ok.
Garage parking extra.

This building has fabulous country club like amenities including:  - Historic landmark and environmentally friendly green building -24 hour state of the art full fitness center -Indoor olympic size swimming pool with sauna, hot tub and locker rooms -Business center w/ conference room and private movie theater -Indoor sky club w/ lounge, games and gourmet private kitchen -On site restaurant and coffee shop with outdoor dining -Boutique hotel style lobby -24 hour concierge service	 -Dry cleaning and laundry service for residents of the building  This unit features: -Washer/dryer in unit -9 to 12 foot soaring high ceilings -Tons of closet space throughout w/custom closets -Hardwood floors -Gourmet kitchens and brand new bathroom finishes -Track lighting in kitchen and bath
take advantage of this wonderful convertible unit
